programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: From Grey Whales to African Elephants, battle to protect their young and secure their bloodline. .

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Mothers wage war as they protect their young, disputes over territory turn toxic and nature's toughest scavengers fight for food. .

programme.title: Africa's Hunters
programme.desc: A family of wild dogs - the Hot Springs Pack - lives in a pristine corner of Zambia's Luangwa Valley. The alpha female has pups in the den, the latest of several litters she and her lifelong partner have had together.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: This killer episode reveals how some of the most dangerous fights are between the same species, whether for territory, bloodline or survival. .

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: The elephant is strong enough to push a two-ton truck, the orangutan has the strength of seven men, and they are both super smart..

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: A deadly predator is stalking the forests of Costa Rica. No, it's not a jaguar, it's a super organism made up of half a million tiny individuals -- an army ant colony..

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: On the edge of the Sahara Desert in Mali, a society struggles to thrive. This isn't a society of humans but of rare desert elephants. More than just a herd of animals, they are a tribe of extended families and comrades with their own unique culture.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs. Cheetah
programme.desc: Big Cat Wars will showcase an incredibly unique stock footage sequence of a moment when a predator on predator conflict turns deadly. The clip of lion vs cheetah is a nail biting moment that will shock, but in the end will shed new light on the mysterious relationship between these extraordinary big cats and their life-and-death struggle for survival.

programme.title: Katavi - Africa's Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi is in the grips of extraordinary drought. A new litter of lion cubs is born into tough conditions, vulnerable to the attack of a rogue male, intent on taking over the pride. Water levels drop by the day, pushing two hippos to overthrow an alpha bull. Distant storms bring not rain but fire sparked by lightning. In the crushing heat, life desperately struggles to hold out for rain.

programme.title: The Pack
programme.desc: The story here examines the tactics used by a pride of South African lions as they hunt three distinct prey animals in the Singita Game Reserve. We'll analyze the Pride's unique strategies as they pursue zebra, impala, and ultimately the tallest land animal, the giraffe.

programme.title: Katavi - Africa's Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi‚Äôs wetlands are unrecognizable in a prolonged drought, reduced to fetid, overcrowded mud wallows. At last, rains resurrect the river, inch by inch. Tensions wash away as hippos and crocodiles rejoice in the return of deep water ‚Ä¶ but flooding traps lion cubs in a precarious position. Normality will finally return to Katavi, but amidst global climate change, for how long?.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: The Pack

programme.title: Future Cat
programme.desc: We've seen big cats past and their present, but until now we could never even imagine their future! With cutting edge visual effects, Future Cats explores far-off future challenges that may await the big cats. Leading experts discuss possible extreme planetary scenarios and the adaptations big cats would to need to make in order to survive.

programme.title: The World's Most Famous Tiger
programme.desc: Known as the Queen of Ranthambore, Machli is the most famous tiger in the world. The legendary tigress is a fearsome warrior known for her daring exploits. And she's the mother of an incredible four litters of cubs. .

programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri is the Speed Queen of the Serengeti - but being fast isn‚Äôt enough. She‚Äôs constantly bullied by hyenas on the grassland and hunted by lions in the marsh. When two of her cubs are killed, the family is exiled to the transition forest. There, she learns to adapt her hunting methods and adds strategy to speed in order to outwit her enemies and steer her remaining cubs successfully to adulthood.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Tricky cases need PVS treatment during a spooky Halloween season! Dr. Pol aids a pot-bellied pig that was attacked by two dogs. A descendant of racehorse Secretariat has a problematic ear issue. A stalled laboring Lab brings a bunch of adorable puppies into the world. And, Dr. Pol helps a sweet kitten find a new home.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Doc Pol offers relief to a blind Jack Russel and helps a dairy cow stuck in labor. Later, the good doctor searches for footing after an amped up Angus sends him airborne. A 250+ pound potbelly gets pushy with Dr. Lisa, while Dr. Nicole grapples with an energetic husky. Dr. Brenda celebrates the holiday season with a skydiving Santa and his elves.

programme.title: Malika: The Lion Queen
programme.desc: Narrated by Hollywood A-Lister actress Angela Bassett and produced by the Emmy-Award-winning producers of Planet Earth II, Blue Planet, and Hostile Planet, we journey with Malika as she deals with the hardships of moving from childhood to adulthood. The lioness must learn to hunt and help protect the pride from deadly intruders.

programme.title: Malika: The Lion Queen
